job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Description:</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Screenings Team aims to increase user safety, reduce the frequency of property damage incidents, and help maintain our brand. </p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We perform background checks and other data searches to score a user's risk.</p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3+ years of data science, data analytics, or business intelligence experience</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong understanding of SQL</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience conducting data analysis in Python</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations </p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insights</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;BS/BA in CS or related field</p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications: </strong></p><p>o&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior experience at a major tech company and/or in management consulting</p><p>o&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with Superset</p><p>o&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with running weblab experiments, efficacy studies, or product validation tests</p><p>o&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with machine learning basics</p><p>o&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with our infrastructure, including Airflow, Presto SQL, and Hive SQL</p><p>o&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience creating and maintaining data pipelines</p><p>o&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience supporting engineering product work</p><p>o&nbsp;&nbsp;MS/MA in CS or related field</p>
